attributes.review: This app is full of advertisements. Every time I click on something, an ad pops up and hits me in the face. My niece grabbed my phone the other day and clicked on the app unknowingly. I heard a scream and crying and ran over to see my phone on the ground with this app open. I thought I could get used to the abuse of the pop up ads, but not the children! I will not let me or my niece get harassed by this app ever again. The only good thing is the fact that it is free to uninstall. Don‚Äôt get this app.
attributes.title: Abusive Ads

I was very angry so i took my dead phone to target to get it fixed. The giraffe at the cash register said it couldn‚Äôt be fixed but happily i found another phone in the dollar section. the end.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS TRASH

attributes.review: This app is the worst app you can possibly download! When using the app they have government officials hack in to your phone and take all your personal information(Phone number, address, Social Security, etc.) They then store this information into a data system to keep track of what you do on your phone. THEY ALSO SCAM YOU!!! After taking your personal information they can later use this against you to scam you into purchasing expensive items. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!

My phone would randomly text or call people and go on random apps or random sites. This app is just a scam and a virus. I do not recommend getting this app unless you want your phone to glitch.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I was just normally downloading this app when suddenly my phone started going off out of nowhere. My phone was buzzing really bad and it then it blew up. Since the phone released deadly gases as it blew up my hand got burned and I fainted. My parents then had to call 911 to get an ambulance due to me literally dying on the floor. I was hospitalised in my local hospital for 6 days because I had major trauma from downloading this app. The main point of this is that this app is horrible and will ruin your life.

attributes.review:
This app is disgusting! I download this app to discover who this ‚ÄúLarge Orange Man‚Äù was, and i was horrified by what I found!

First of all, I downloaded it on my grandmothers phone, and it gave her a virus! The virus actually sent her location to Russian spies who came and kidnapped her! I still haven‚Äôt seen her since, and that happened 2 weeks ago! üòæ

But despite all of that, I still gave the app a chance. And boy, was I mistaken. Not only does this app continually pop of with loud videos of a man screaming profanities at me, but it also keeps asking me to sign up and join this group- they specialize in ‚Äúeating children‚Äù whatever that means? I can only assume it‚Äôs some new slang that teenagers useüôÑ I tried to google it but all that came up was ‚ÄúEpstein‚Äù? What???

Overall horrible app development. Take it down!!
attributes.title: I am appalled

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded it everything started glitching. then as soon as i opened the app this orange sweaty man was looking at me and i got scared. i dont know if he was supposed to be there or not but like he gave off racist vibes. also there were to many notifications and every time i swiped one away within 5 seconds there was another one. i couldn't even use my phone. this app is the worst app i have ever downloaded, DO NOT get this app its a waste of time and space.
